title: Add Contentsquare tracking script to site <head> and provide install verification

requirements.text: Insert the following Contentsquare tracking script into the <head> of the app so it loads on all routes/pages: <script src="https://t.contentsquare.net/uxa/f6cd018ba08fc.js"></script>.

quotes:
Copy the code.
<script src="https://t.contentsquare.net/uxa/f6cd018ba08fc.js"></script>

Copy
2
Paste the code into the <head> of every page where you want to track user behavior or collect feedback.

acceptanceCriteria: The script is present in the final rendered page source when visiting the site in a browser.

requirements.text: Add a lightweight install verification check (English user-facing text) that confirms whether the Contentsquare script tag loads successfully and reports success/failure in the browser console without breaking the app if the script is blocked.

quotes: To make sure everything is ready, verify that your code was installed.

acceptanceCriteria: When the Contentsquare script loads successfully, the browser console shows an English confirmation message (e.g., "Contentsquare tracking script loaded").

If the Contentsquare script fails to load (e.g., blocked), the browser console shows an English warning message (e.g., "Contentsquare tracking script failed to load") and the app continues functioning normally.

constraints: Do not modify or remove the existing Google Analytics instrumentation in frontend/index.html.
nonGoals: Do not add any additional third-party analytics tools beyond the provided Contentsquare script.
Do not add backend changes for Contentsquare (tracking must be frontend-only).
